SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Account Fields

The Account object represents an individual shopper. When using person accounts, an account of the Person Account record type represents an individual shopper. When not using person accounts, a standard account and contact together represent an individual shopper. A business account buyer or shopper always has a standard account and a contact.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Account object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Account Name	The name of the account. If the account is a person account, the account name is the concatenation of the first name, middle name, last name, and suffix of the associated person contact.
Account Number	The account number assigned to this account (not the unique, system-generated ID assigned during creation).
Account Owner	The user who owns the account.
Account Record Type	The ID of the record type assigned to the account.
Account Source	The source of the account record, for example, advertisement or trade show.
Annual Revenue	The estimated annual revenue of the account.
Assistant	The name of the assistant assigned to the account.
Asst. Phone	The phone number of the assistant assigned to the account.
Billing Address	The billing address for the account.
Birthdate	The birth date of the contact assigned to the account.
Department	The department the account is assigned to.
Description	The description of the account.
Email	The email address for the account.
Email Opt Out	Indicates whether the account has opted out of email (true) or not (false).
Employees	The number of employees working at the company represented by the account.
Fax	The fax number for the account.
Home Phone	The home phone number for the account’s contact.
Individual	The ID of the data privacy record associated with the account.
Industry	The industry associated with the account.
Lead Source	The lead source for the account.
Mailing Address	The mailing address for the account.
Mobile	The mobile phone number for the account
Other Address	The alternate address for the account.
Other Phone	The alternate phone number for the account.
Ownership	The ownership type for the account, for example, private, public, or subsidiary.
Parent Account	The name of the parent account, if any.
Phone	The phone number for the account
Rating	The prospect rating for the account, for example, hot, warm, or cold.
Shipping Address	The shipping address for the account.
Title	The title for contact assigned to the account.
